workflow.name: Validate email lists weekly with Google Sheets, VerifiEmail and Gmail reports
workflow.description:
# Email List Hygiene - Automated Weekly Validator

## Overview

Validates email lists through automated checks, categorizes results as Valid/Invalid/Risky, updates Google Sheets in real-time, and delivers HTML reports. Runs every Friday at 5 PM via cron scheduling.

---

## Workflow Architecture

```
Schedule Trigger ‚Üí Read Google Sheets ‚Üí Loop (Process Each Email)
    ‚Üí Validate API ‚Üí IF Branch (Valid/Invalid)
    ‚Üí Update Google Sheets ‚Üí Merge ‚Üí Loop Back
    ‚Üí Calculate Statistics ‚Üí Send Email Report
```

### Loop Mechanism
- Split in Batches processes one email at a time
- Each email: validate ‚Üí branch ‚Üí update sheet ‚Üí merge ‚Üí continue
- Loop accumulates all results internally
- "Done" output triggers statistics calculation after all emails processed

### Health Score Formula
```
Score = (Valid% √ó 100) - (Invalid% √ó 20) - (Risky% √ó 10)
Bounded: 0-100
```

**Ranges:**
- 80-100: Excellent (green)
- 60-79: Good (orange)  
- 0-59: Needs Attention (red)

---

## Prerequisites

**Required:**
- Google account with Sheets access
- Email validation API (VerifiEmail)
- n8n v1.0+

## Google Sheet Structure

| Column | Type | Filled By |
|--------|------|-----------|
| row_number | Number | Auto-generated |
| name | Text | You |
| email | Text | You |
| status | Text | Workflow |
| checked_at | Text | Workflow |
| notes | Text | Workflow |

Only populate first three columns.

---

## Setup

### 1. Import Template
Import JSON file to n8n via Workflows ‚Üí Add workflow ‚Üí Import from File

### 2. Configure Credentials

**Google Sheets OAuth2** (used by 3 nodes):
- Create credential via any Google Sheets node
- Grant spreadsheet permissions
- Apply same credential to all Google Sheets nodes

**Validation API:**
- Get API key from https://verifi.email
- Add credential to "Validate Email Address" node

**Gmail OAuth2:**
- Add credential to "Send Weekly Report" node
- Grant email sending permissions

### 3. Connect Google Sheet

In all three Google Sheets nodes:
- Select your spreadsheet from Document dropdown
- Select sheet tab
- Verify "Column to Match On" = row_number (for Update nodes)

### 4. Set Email Recipient

In "Send Weekly Report" node:
- Change "Send To" from placeholder to your email
- Optional: Add CC/BCC for multiple recipients

### 5. Test

- Add 3-5 test emails (mix of valid/invalid)
- Click "Execute Workflow"
- Verify sheet updates and email arrives

### 6. Activate

Toggle "Active" switch. Workflow runs automatically every Friday at 5 PM.

---

## Customization

**Change Schedule:**
Edit "Weekly Schedule" node cron expression:
- Daily 9 AM: `0 9 * * *`
- Monday 5 PM: `0 17 * * 1`
- First of month: `0 9 1 * *`

**Email Design:**
Edit HTML in "Send Weekly Report" message field. Modify colors (search hex codes), text, or add branding.

**Archive Invalid Emails:**
Add Google Sheets Append node after "Update Invalid Status" ‚Üí create "Invalid_Archive" tab ‚Üí append email, name, reason, date

**Slack Notifications:**
Add Slack node after email report ‚Üí configure channel ‚Üí use summary text from statistics

**Rate Limiting:**
Add Wait node (1-2 seconds) after validation for large lists to prevent API throttling

---

## Troubleshooting

**"Column not found":**
Verify exact column names in sheet: `row_number`, `name`, `email`, `status`, `checked_at`, `notes` (case-sensitive)

**Only processes 1 email:**
Check Google Sheets node Range field is empty or set to include all rows. Verify "Use Header Row" enabled.

**Wrong statistics:**
Enable "Execute Once" in Calculate Statistics node settings (gear icon)

**Email not arriving:**
Check spam/promotions folder, verify Gmail credential authorized, confirm recipient address correct

**API errors:**
Verify API key valid, check quota not exceeded, test with simple email like test@gmail.com

**Merge node error:**
Confirm both Update nodes connect to Merge inputs (top and bottom). Check both branches execute successfully.

---

## Validation Checks

Each email undergoes:
- RFC 5322 format compliance
- MX record existence (domain has mail servers)
- SMTP verification (mailbox exists)
- Disposable email service detection
- Catch-all domain detection

**Categories:**
- Valid: All checks passed
- Invalid: Critical checks failed
- Risky: Disposable or catch-all domain

---

## Support

Check execution logs in n8n Executions tab for errors. Use "Execute Node" on individual nodes to isolate issues. Visit n8n community forum for additional help.

---

## Tags
`email-validation` `marketing-automation` `data-cleaning` `google-sheets` `scheduled-workflow` `deliverability` `list-hygiene`

parameters.subject: =üìß Email Hygiene Report - {{ $now.format("MMM DD, YYYY") }}

parameters.content:
## EMAIL LIST HYGIENE AUTOMATION

Automatically validates your email list **every Friday at 5 PM**.

‚úÖ What it does:
- **Reads emails** from **Google Sheets**
- Validates each email (format, MX records, deliverability)
- Categorizes as **Valid**, **Invalid**, or **Risky**
- Updates sheet with **validation status** and **timestamp**
- Generates **health score** and **statistics**
- Sends **professional HTML report** via **email**

üìà Benefits:
- Improved **deliverability**(reduce 15%+ bounce rates to <2%)
- Better sender reputation with **ISPs**
- Higher campaign **ROI and engagement**
- **GDPR/CAN-SPAM compliance** ready

‚è±Ô∏è Runs: **Every Friday at 5:00 PM**
üìß Processes: **Unlimited emails**(loops through all)

## SETUP REQUIRED (5 minutes)

Before activating this workflow:

1. **Google Sheets** Setup:
   Create sheet with these exact columns:
   ‚Ä¢ row_number (auto-generated by Sheets)
   ‚Ä¢ name
   ‚Ä¢ email
   ‚Ä¢ status **(leave blank - auto-filled)**
   ‚Ä¢ checked_at **(leave blank - auto-filled)**
   ‚Ä¢ notes **(leave blank - auto-filled)**

2. Credentials Needed:
   ‚Ä¢ Google Sheets OAuth2
   ‚Ä¢ Email validation API **(VerifiEmail)** at **https://verifi.email**
   ‚Ä¢ Gmail OAuth2 (for sending reports)

3. Configure Email Recipient:
   ‚Ä¢ Open **"Send Email Report"** node
   ‚Ä¢ Change **"sendTo"** from **"marketing.manager@company.com"**
   ‚Ä¢ Use: **your-email@company.com** or **team@company.com**
   ‚Ä¢ Optional: Add CC/BCC for multiple recipients

4. Test Before Activating:
   ‚Ä¢ Add **3-5 test emails** to your **sheet**
   ‚Ä¢ Click "Execute Workflow" button
   ‚Ä¢ Verify sheet updates correctly
   ‚Ä¢ Check **email report arrives**
   ‚Ä¢ Then toggle **"Active"** switch

## EMAIL VALIDATION PROCESS

Processes each email **individually** in a **loop**:

**STEP 1**: Loop starts
   ‚Üí Takes one email from sheet

**STEP 2**: Validation checks
   ‚úì Email format (RFC 5322 compliance)
   ‚úì Domain has mail server (MX records)
   ‚úì Mailbox exists (SMTP verification)
   ‚úì Not disposable email service
   ‚úì Not catch-all domain

**STEP 3**: Categorization
   ‚úÖ VALID - Passes all checks, safe to use
   ‚ùå INVALID - Failed checks, remove from list
   ‚ö†Ô∏è RISKY - Disposable or catch-all, review

**STEP 4**: Update sheet
   ‚Ä¢ Writes status to row
   ‚Ä¢ Adds timestamp
   ‚Ä¢ Includes reason/notes

**STEP 5**: Loop continues
   ‚Üí Processes next email
   ‚Üí Repeats until all done

**Speed**: ~1-2 emails per second
Handles: **1000+ emails ** automatically

## TRUE/FALSE BRANCHING

**IF node splits workflow** based on **validation**:

‚úÖ TRUE BRANCH (Valid Emails):
   Condition: validation.valid === true
   ‚Üì
   Process Valid Email code:
   ‚Ä¢ Status: "valid"
   ‚Ä¢ Note: **"Email verified successfully"**
   ‚Ä¢ Check for disposable flag
   ‚Üì
   Update Valid Status:
   ‚Ä¢ Updates Google Sheet row
   ‚Ä¢ Writes status, timestamp, notes
   ‚Üì
   **Merge Input 1**:
   ‚Ä¢ Collects valid email data

‚ùå FALSE BRANCH **(Invalid Emails)**:
   Condition: validation.valid === false
   ‚Üì
   Process Invalid Email code:
   ‚Ä¢ Status: "invalid"
   ‚Ä¢ Note: Specific reason (no MX, bad format, etc.)
   ‚Üì
   Update Invalid Status:
   ‚Ä¢ Updates Google Sheet row
   ‚Ä¢ Writes status, timestamp, notes
   ‚Üì
   **Merge Input 2**:
   ‚Ä¢ Collects invalid email data

üîó Merge combines both branches ‚Üí loops back

## MERGE & LOOP COMPLETION

The **Merge node** is critical for data flow:

**INPUT 1**: Valid emails from **TRUE** branch
**INPUT 2**: Invalid emails from **FALSE** branch

What Merge does:
- Combines both data streams
- Creates single unified output
- Feeds back to **Loop Over Items**
- Loop accumulates all processed emails internally

Loop Behavior:
- Continues processing next email
- Repeats **validation ‚Üí branch ‚Üí merge ‚Üí loop**
- Tracks all items internally
- When complete, "done" output fires

**DONE** Output:
- Triggers only after ALL emails processed
- Sends accumulated data to Calculate Statistics
- Contains complete results from all iterations

This ensures every email is validated and collected
before generating the final report.

## ANALYTICS & REPORTING

After all emails processed:

1Ô∏è‚É£ **Calculate Statistics**:
   Receives all accumulated emails from loop
   
   **Calculates**:
   ‚Ä¢ **Total emails** processed
   ‚Ä¢ **Valid count** & **percentage** 
   ‚Ä¢ **Invalid count** & **percentage** 
   ‚Ä¢ **Risky count** & **percentage**
   
   **Health Score Formula** (0-100):
   = **(Valid% √ó 100) - (Invalid% √ó 20) - (Risky% √ó 10)**
   
   **Scoring**:
   ‚Ä¢ **80-100: Excellent ‚úÖ (Green)**
   ‚Ä¢ **60-79: Good ‚ö†Ô∏è (Orange)**
   ‚Ä¢ **0-59: Needs Attention ‚ùå (Red)**
   
   **Creates**:
   ‚Ä¢ Summary text
   ‚Ä¢ Email lists by category
   ‚Ä¢ Invalid emails with reasons

2Ô∏è‚É£ **Send Email Report**:
   Beautiful **HTML email** with:
   ‚Ä¢ **Color-coded health score badge**
   ‚Ä¢ **4 stat cards (valid/invalid/risky/total)**
   ‚Ä¢ **Action items list**
   ‚Ä¢ **Invalid emails with detailed reasons**
   ‚Ä¢ **Direct link to Google Sheet**
   ‚Ä¢ Campaign impact insights
   ‚Ä¢ Professional branding

**Sent to**: Configurable recipients
üìÖ Frequency: **Every Friday at 5:00 PM**

## CUSTOMIZATION OPTIONS

Easy modifications:

‚è∞ Change Schedule:
   ‚Ä¢ **Edit "Weekly Schedule" node**
   ‚Ä¢ Current: 0 17 * * 5 (Friday 5PM)
   ‚Ä¢ Examples:
     - Daily 9AM: 0 9 * * *
     - Every Monday: 0 17 * * 1
     - First of month: 0 9 1 * *

üìß Multiple Recipients:
   ‚Ä¢ "Send Email Report" node ‚Üí Add options

   ‚Ä¢ Comma-separate: email1@co.com,email2@co.com

üìä Add Slack Notifications:
   ‚Ä¢ Add Slack node after email
   ‚Ä¢ Channel: #marketing
   ‚Ä¢ Quick text summary for instant alerts

üóÉÔ∏è Archive Invalid Emails:
   ‚Ä¢ Add Google Sheets node on FALSE branch
   ‚Ä¢ Operation: Append
   ‚Ä¢ Sheet: Create "Invalid_Archive" tab
   ‚Ä¢ Keeps historical record

üìà Export to CRM:
   ‚Ä¢ Add HTTP Request/Webhook node
   ‚Ä¢ Push validated emails to HubSpot/Salesforce
   ‚Ä¢ Keep CRM automatically synced

‚ö° Rate Limiting (if needed):
   ‚Ä¢ Add "Wait" node after validation
   ‚Ä¢ Wait: 1-2 seconds
   ‚Ä¢ Prevents API throttling for large lists

üé® Customize Email Design:
   ‚Ä¢ Edit HTML in "Send Email Report"
   ‚Ä¢ Change colors, fonts, branding
   ‚Ä¢ Add company logo

## TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE

**Common issues & solutions**:

‚ùå "Column not found" error:
   **Fix**: Check **Google Sheet** has exact column names
   ‚Ä¢ Names are **case-sensitive**
   ‚Ä¢ Required: row_number, name, email, status, checked_at, notes

‚ùå **Loop processes only 1 email**:
   **Fix**: Check Google Sheets node returns multiple rows
   ‚Ä¢ Verify "Range" field is empty or set to A:F
   ‚Ä¢ Check "Use Header Row" is enabled

‚ùå **Statistics show wrong counts**:
   **Fix**: Enable "Execute Once" in Calculate Statistics
   ‚Ä¢ Click gear icon on node
   ‚Ä¢ Toggle "Execute Once" to ON
   ‚Ä¢ This processes all items together, not one-by-one

‚ùå **Email doesn't arrive**:
   **Fix**: Check several things
   ‚Ä¢ Gmail spam/promotions folder
   ‚Ä¢ Gmail credential is authorized
   ‚Ä¢ Recipient email is correct
   ‚Ä¢ Try different recipient to test

‚ùå **Validation API errors**:
   **Fix**: Verify API access
   ‚Ä¢ Check API key is valid
   ‚Ä¢ Verify quota not exceeded
   ‚Ä¢ Test with known email: test@gmail.com

‚ùå **Merge node shows "missing input"**:
   **Fix**: Both branches must connect to Merge
   ‚Ä¢ TRUE branch ‚Üí Merge Input 1
   ‚Ä¢ FALSE branch ‚Üí Merge Input 2
   ‚Ä¢ Both Update nodes must complete

üí° Debug Tips:
   ‚Ä¢ Click individual nodes ‚Üí "Execute Node"
   ‚Ä¢ Check OUTPUT panel for each step
   ‚Ä¢ Use console.log() in code nodes
   ‚Ä¢ Test with 3-5 emails before full list
   ‚Ä¢ Check execution log (bottom panel) for errors

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
